pageProduct.name: Alkira Hydra+ Hydrating Facial Oil 30ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

97% of women enjoyed an improvement in skin hydration and softness after two weeks of using our Hydrating Facial Oil. Contains 14 plant and nut oils purposefully picked for their antioxidant, essential fatty acid and nourishing profiles.

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation occurs, rinse immediately and discontinue use. We recommend patch testing. For external use only.

Common Uses

Key Benefits: • Omega 6 linoleic acid which is useful for balancing sebum production and creates a natural protective layer • Essential fatty acid rich Kangaroo Paw to help improve skin hydration, elasticity and assist cell renewal and repair • Antioxidant rich Rosehip and Borage oils • A super hydrating combination of Jojoba, Avocado, Evening Primrose and Argan to support the appearance of skin suppleness and firmness. • Rich in vitamin A and linoleic acid, Apricot Kernel Oil to help improve skin tone and skin elasticity. • Light weight and fast absorbing

Ingredients

Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil , Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Macadamia Integrifolia Seed Oil, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Borago Officinalis Seed Oil, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil (Argan), Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Anigozanthos flavidus Flower Extract (Kangaroo Flower), Tocopherol (Vitamin E) *contains Macadamia nut oil

Directions

Apply 2-3 drops to palm of hand. Use fingers to massage into cleansed face morning and night, or as desired.
